description:
This place is a super spacious, one Bedroom apartment located in Astoria-Queens, just 25 minutes away by train to Manhattan!

The Kitchen is the biggest you will ever see & it is great for cooking!

The bedroom is large with a bathroom inside. 
The bedroom has 3 large windows with wonderful natural lighting.

All Access

I am always available by phone! Please feel free to text anytime!

Astoria is known for it's Greek Culture. 
It is a great area where I live & very safe for woman traveling alone. 

There is plenty of bars, restaurants, & shopping (Express, Gap) just footsteps out my door. 

You are just 5 minutes from the "R" train to get you directly into the City in just 25 minutes.

The closest train to me is the "R & M" train & this is just out my door/5 minutes away

I then have the "N & Q" just 8 minutes walking distance from me too on Broadway!
name: Super Large & Cozy One Bedroom Apartment
review: Tons of space for two people. Comfortable and quiet, and close to plenty of food, drink and public transportation in Astoria
